backend/main.mo: Defines product, cart, order, and user profile types, initializes authorization and persistent maps, and seeds an initial product catalog.
feature_evidence.json: Specifies evidence for the branding‑rename feature, listing affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of various frontend files including pages, hooks, components, and state modules.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind CSS variables and theming for light and dark modes using OKLCH color values.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting the page title to Kaninwals E Commerce and loading the main React script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and wraps the application with theme and cart providers.
frontend/src/components/admin/AccessDeni: Displays an access‑denied card with an option to navigate back home.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminGuard: Checks authentication and admin status, showing loaders or denial screens before rendering admin content.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Requires user authentication to view protected content, showing a sign‑in prompt when needed.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with query cache clearing on logout and error handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting new users for their name to complete profile setup, still referencing old GlobalMart branding.
frontend/src/components/layout/StoreLayo: Layout component providing header, search, navigation, authentication actions, and wrapping children for the store UI.
frontend/src/components/products/Product: Displays a grid of product cards with pricing, stock status, and add‑to‑cart functionality.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity, refreshing dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminProducts.ts: React Query hooks for admin actions like checking admin status and adding, updating, or deleting products.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, stored identity loading, and state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching products, orders, and performing order creation using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Hooks for retrieving and saving the current user's profile through the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup with custom theme variables and base styling for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app, setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the root component.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProductsPa: Admin interface for listing, creating, editing, and deleting products using modal dialogs and product mutations.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Displays the shopping cart, allowing quantity updates, item removal, and subtotal display, with an empty-cart fallback.
frontend/src/pages/CategoryPage.tsx: Fetches and displays products for a specific category with loading state handling.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Handles checkout with shipping form, order creation, identity verification, and redirects on success.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage with hero content, features, category links, and a featured products grid.
frontend/src/pages/OrderConfirmationPage: Shows order confirmation details including items, address, and total, with loading and missing-order states.
frontend/src/pages/OrderDetailPage.tsx: Displays detailed order information for authenticated users, including items, price, and shipping address.
frontend/src/pages/OrdersPage.tsx: Renders a list of the user's orders with status, price, and links to order details, handling loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/ProductPage.tsx: Displays product details, stock info, and quantity selection with the ability to add the product to the cart.
frontend/src/pages/SearchPage.tsx: Provides a debounced search interface for querying products and displays results or prompts based on input.
frontend/src/state/cart.ts: Contains cart utility functions for storage, subtotal calculation, and item CRUD operations.
frontend/src/state/CartProvider.tsx: Implements a React context for managing cart state, persistence, and cart operations like add, remove, and update.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, supporting both query and hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, animations, container settings, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata including schema version, project summary, existing implemented features, and new feature requests.
